content:
The Patient (https://worldhealthorganization.github.io/ddcc/StructureDefinition-DDCCPatient.html) and Immunization (https://worldhealthorganization.github.io/ddcc/StructureDefinition-DDCCImmunization.html) profiles are based on the core resources
I assume this is a mistake and they should be based on the 'special' IPS ones: https://worldhealthorganization.github.io/ddcc/StructureDefinition-Patient-pre-uv-ips.html and https://worldhealthorganization.github.io/ddcc/StructureDefinition-Immunization-pre-uv-ips.html ?
Yes they should. Thanks for the flag. Feel free to submit an issue via GitHub or make a pull request, but we will take care of if not
